GSD.description:
selinux: allow FIOCLEX and FIONCLEX with policy capability

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit b2ec24277169ea5b68d6c25f9885afe5b711ff5a. For more details please see the references link.
